tooltips.destiny: Destiny is a measure of the character's fate and fortune.
tooltips.carrier: Carrier is the character's profession or occupation.
tooltips.virtue: Virtue is the character's moral compass.
tooltips.vice: Vice is the character's moral failing.
tooltips.archetype: Archetype is the character's role in the world.
tooltips.armor: Armor is the character's protective gear.
tooltips.talents: Talents are the character's unique abilities.
tooltips.specialities: Specialities are the character's areas of expertise.
tooltips.abilities: Abilities are the character's learned skills.
